messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Takayama Ukon Info?
messages.msgSnippet: ... There was a very informative and interesting bio of him in Monumenta Nipponica sometime in the 1950s or 60s. You can find it -- or at least the citation
messages.messageBody:
Shay A. wrote:

> Does anybody know of websites or books that contain extensive info on
> the Christian Samurai, Takayama Ukon?

There was a very informative and interesting bio of him in Monumenta Nipponica
sometime in the 1950s or 60s. You can find it -- or at least the citation for it
-- if you go to their website and go through the index or search for his name.
(That bio, by the way, is in French.)

Tony

--

Anthony J. Bryant
Website: http://www.sengokudaimyo.com

Effingham's Heraldic Avatars (...and stuff):
http://www.sengokudaimyo.com/avatarbiz.html

Grand Cross, Order of the Laurel:
http://www.cafepress.com/laurelorder

messages.subject: Takayama Ukon Info?
messages.msgSnippet: Does anybody know of websites or books that contain extensive info on the Christian Samurai, Takayama Ukon? I have read the bio on samurai-archives.com and am
messages.messageBody:
Does anybody know of websites or books that contain extensive info on
the Christian Samurai, Takayama Ukon?

I have read the bio on samurai-archives.com and am just looking for
more info on him...

-thanks
